net.proteusframework.core.locale

Class AbstractLocalizedObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.locale.AbstractLocalizedObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalizedObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalizedText

    public abstract class AbstractLocalizedObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocalizedObject
    Base class for classes that handle localization in MIWT. The key is opaque and determined by the mechanism that retrieves the localization values. All subclasses must provide a constructor that takes the key as the first argument and the localized value as the second argument. See LocalizedText as an example.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
